name: Richard See
profile: Front-end Developer / React Developer with 3-4 years commercial experience utilising a wide range of technologies, most notably in React and .NET development. Proficient in all aspects of the software development cycle, delivering intuitive software solutions for the customer. Experience in several industries including telecommunications, defence and education.

Possesses core development competencies and skills developed through small and large-scale projects, implementing Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban) to streamline processes and allow fast, continuous delivery. Has strong interpersonal skills and thrives in team environments, collaborating to develop a fitting solution. Handles problems with ambiguity well, working in a logical manner to reach a desirable outcome. Adaptable and flexible communication skills have ensured effective liaison with technical and business stakeholders, as well as helped translate technical concepts to non-technical clients.
Seeks contract work being immediately available for both interviews and starts for most locations within London, having recently arrived from New Zealand.

educationAchievements.title: The University of Auckland
educationAchievements.description: Bachelor of Engineering (Honours) in Computer Systems Engineering

educationAchievements.title: Winner of Engineering Part IV Research Project
educationAchievements.description: Parallel and Distributed Systems Category: Distributed Context-Aware Intelligent Environment

work.title: React Development
description: Built new homepage to deliver personalised customer experiences
Collaborated with designers and testers to produce highly reusable and robust components to deploy across the Spark website
Tests written using Jest, Enzyme and Storybook

work.title: Spark Public WiFi
description: Design of captive portals for customers and general public to access free WiFi through phone boxes located nationwide
Refined connection journey resulting in simpler user experience and text message cost reduction of 40%
Implemented front-end design to enable WiFi access to Australian and UK mobile numbers
Worked closely with customers to develop custom captive portals, delivered fast turnaround with high satisfaction

work.title: ReAssure Communications
description: Built web application to view and send comms for priority incidents using ASP.NET MVC to replace licensed tool purchased annually
Involved in all stages of software development lifecycle
Full-stack development - managed database changes using SQL Server right to UI/UX design with jQuery and Kendo UI for webpage interaction
Completed project resulted in yearly savings of $250,000

work.title: Mentor
description: Mentored TupuToa intern over summer providing leadership and direction around ReAssure project, reinforced best coding practices
Day-to-day guidance and introduction to company culture

work.title: Environment Monitor
description: Created an end-to-end environment monitor solution as a side project
Designed and built a sensor board to feed environmental data into a Raspberry Pi. Data retrieved and aggregated using Python scripts
Digital Ocean droplet stood up to hold data using InfluxDB, with Splunk and Grafana handling visualisation

work.title: Laser Beam Alignment Tool
description: Repurposed existing laser detector modules worn by soldiers into a matrix to align weapons more efficiently using C
Delivered project in sprints implementing the Atlassian Stack
Hands-on experience with tools and equipment to test and debug

work.title: Online Tutor
description: Tutored Australian students 1:1 online from ages 8-18
Lessons held through web application connecting students to tutors in real time, with a chat messenger and whiteboard for interaction
Shared knowledge of subjects, coached and mentored students through questions to achieve better understanding
Subjects: Maths, Physics, Science, Assignment Research, Study Skills

interests.title: Exploring Technologies
interests.description: Built controller connected to Raspberry Pi to control LIFX lights
